description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一类特殊的自治州的俗称，此类自治州同时管辖县级行政区和地级行政区。
description.en: A colloquial term for a special type of autonomous prefecture in the People's Republic of China that administers both county-level and prefecture-level administrative regions.

description.zh-cn: 位于广西省的历史上的一个副省级自治州。
description.en: A historical sub-provincial autonomous prefecture in Guangxi province.

description.zh-cn: 历史上的一个地级行政区，曾由桂西僮族自治州管辖。
description.en: A historical prefecture-level administrative region, once under the jurisdiction of the Guixi Zhuang Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 历史上的一个地级行政区，曾由桂西僮族自治州管辖。
description.en: A historical prefecture-level administrative region, once under the jurisdiction of the Guixi Zhuang Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区下辖的自治州，是现存唯一既辖地区、又辖县市的自治州，其行政级别为副省级建制但存在争议。
description.en: An autonomous prefecture in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China. It is the only existing autonomous prefecture that administers both prefectures and county-level cities. Its administrative level is sub-provincial but is a subject of dispute.

nodes.id: 行政区 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 行政区 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一种行政区划单位，也称行署区，级别曾相当于省。
description.en: A type of historical administrative division unit in the People's Republic of China, also known as an administrative region, which was equivalent to a province.

nodes.id: 伊犁哈萨克自治州各级人民代表大会和各级人民委员会组织条例

zh-cn: 伊犁哈萨克自治州各级人民代表大会和各级人民委员会组织条例
伊犁州人大和人委组织条例

description.zh-cn: 一项关于伊犁哈萨克自治州地方政权组织的地方性法规，已于1987年被废止。
description.en: A local regulation concerning the organization of local authorities in the Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture, which was abolished in 1987.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省曾经设立的一个副省级行政区，于1988年撤销并改设为海南省。
description.en: A former sub-provincial administrative region of Guangdong Province, PRC, which was abolished and reconstituted as Hainan Province in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，由原海南行政区升格而来。
description.en: A province-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, upgraded from the former Hainan Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国解决民族问题的基本政策。
description.en: The basic policy of the People's Republic of China for resolving ethnic issues.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国政务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政务院
en: Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高国家行政机关，1954年改组为中华人民共和国国务院。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ during the early years of the People's Republic of China, reorganized into the State Council of the PRC in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 新疆省的行政管理机关，1955年随着新疆维吾尔自治区的成立而撤销。
description.en: The administrative body of Xinjiang Province, which was dissolved in 1955 with the establishment of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

nodes.id: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部
en: Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 桂西僮族自治州在1956年至1958年期间为副省级自治州，管辖地级百色专区。
description.en: From 1956 to 1958, the Guixi Zhuang Autonomous Prefecture was a sub-provincial autonomous prefecture and had jurisdiction over the prefecture-level Baise Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 桂西僮族自治州在1956年至1958年期间为副省级自治州，管辖地级宜山专区。
description.en: From 1956 to 1958, the Guixi Zhuang Autonomous Prefecture was a sub-provincial autonomous prefecture and had jurisdiction over the prefecture-level Yishan Prefecture.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1953年4月，中共中央批准了《新疆省民族区域自治实施计划草案》，该计划确定了建立伊犁哈萨克自治区的方针。
description.en: In April 1953, the CPC Central Committee approved the 'Draft Implementation Plan for Regional Ethnic Autonomy in Xinjiang Province,' which established the policy for creating the Ili Kazakh Autonomous Region.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国政务院

description.zh-cn: 1953年12月，经政务院批准成立伊犁哈萨克自治区（后改为自治州）。
description.en: In December 1953, the Government Administration Council approved the establishment of the Ili Kazakh Autonomous Region (later renamed Autonomous Prefecture).

description.zh-cn: 伊犁哈萨克自治区（后改为自治州）成立后，属新疆省人民政府领导，直至1955年10月新疆维吾尔自治区成立。
description.en: After its establishment, the Ili Kazakh Autonomous Region (later Prefecture) was under the leadership of the Xinjiang Provincial People's Government until the establishment of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region in October 1955.

description.zh-cn: 伊犁哈萨克自治州名义上管辖塔城地区，但对其党政领导没有任免权限，相关任命由新疆维吾尔自治区党委组织部进行。
description.en: The Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture nominally has jurisdiction over Tacheng Prefecture, but lacks the authority to appoint or dismiss its party and government leaders; such appointments are made by the Organization Department of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 伊犁哈萨克自治州名义上管辖阿勒泰地区，但对其党政领导没有任免权限，相关任命由新疆维吾尔自治区党委组织部进行。
description.en: The Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture nominally has jurisdiction over Altay Prefecture, but lacks the authority to appoint or dismiss its party and government leaders; such appointments are made by the Organization Department of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Party Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1984年9月，国务院发文重申伊犁哈萨克自治州对伊犁、塔城、阿勒泰三个地区的管辖权。
description.en: In September 1984, the State Council issued a document reaffirming the jurisdiction of the Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture over the three prefectures of Ili, Tacheng, and Altay.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 伊犁哈萨克自治州各级人民代表大会和各级人民委员会组织条例

description.zh-cn: 1987年，全国人大常委会决定废止该条例，使得伊犁州的行政级别问题失去部分法规依据。
description.en: In 1987, the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress decided to abolish this regulation, which caused the administrative status of Ili Prefecture to lose some of its legal basis.

relationships.target: 行政区 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 1988年原海南行政区升格为海南省后，行署区这一行政区划类型彻底退出中华人民共和国行政区划序列。
description.en: After the former Hainan Administrative Region was upgraded to Hainan Province in 1988, the administrative division type of 'administrative region' (行署区) was completely phased out from the administrative division sequence of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 1987年经自治区党委和人民政府批准，伊犁州行政待遇调整，其人大常委会主任、州长享受副省级待遇。
description.en: In 1987, with the approval of the regional Party Committee and People's Government, the administrative treatment of Ili Prefecture was adjusted, with its People's Congress Standing Committee Chairman and Governor receiving sub-provincial level treatment.

relationships.source: 新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 1987年经自治区党委和人民政府批准，伊犁州行政待遇调整，其人大常委会主任、州长享受副省级待遇。
description.en: In 1987, with the approval of the regional Party Committee and People's Government, the administrative treatment of Ili Prefecture was adjusted, with its People's Congress Standing Committee Chairman and Governor receiving sub-provincial level treatment.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 民政部在其行政区划统计中，将伊犁州列为地级行政区（自治州）。
description.en: The Ministry of Civil Affairs lists Ili Prefecture as a prefecture-level administrative region (autonomous prefecture) in its administrative division statistics.

relationships.target: 中国共产党新疆维吾尔自治区委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 2013年7月，时任伊犁州党委书记的李学军兼任自治区党委常委，升为副省部级干部。
description.en: In July 2013, Li Xuejun, then Party Secretary of Ili Prefecture, was appointed as a member of the Standing Committee of the Regional Party Committee, and was promoted to a sub-provincial and ministerial level cadre.
